itunes:title: Episode 434 - The Coward from Broward
title: Episode 434 - The Coward from Broward
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Straight Pride Parade in Boston, the world's fascination with the new "Kyle", the end of "Jeopardy James" win streak, China giving "social credit scores" to every citizen, and the debate over whether or not the...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the Straight Pride Parade in Boston, the world's fascination with the new "Kyle", the end of "Jeopardy James" win streak, China giving "social credit scores" to every citizen, and the debate over whether or not the Broward County deputy in the Parkland Shootings should be charged with murder.
